entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 10:18 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: NE 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
